org.springframework.validation

接口 MessageCodeFormatter

  • 所有已知实现类:
    DefaultMessageCodesResolver.Format

    public interface MessageCodeFormatter
    A strategy interface for formatting message codes.
    从以下版本开始:
    3.2
    作者:
    Chris Beams
    另请参阅:
    DefaultMessageCodesResolver, DefaultMessageCodesResolver.Format

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      java.lang.String format(java.lang.String errorCode, java.lang.String objectName, java.lang.String field)
      Build and return a message code consisting of the given fields, usually delimited by DefaultMessageCodesResolver.CODE_SEPARATOR.

    • 方法详细资料

      • format

        java.lang.String format(java.lang.String errorCode,
                        @Nullable
                        java.lang.String objectName,
                        @Nullable
                        java.lang.String field)
        Build and return a message code consisting of the given fields, usually delimited by DefaultMessageCodesResolver.CODE_SEPARATOR.
        参数:
        errorCode - e.g.: "typeMismatch"
        objectName - e.g.: "user"
        field - e.g. "age"
        返回:
        concatenated message code, e.g.: "typeMismatch.user.age"
        另请参阅:
        DefaultMessageCodesResolver.Format
